subject: Hockey, Ice
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Moore, a former Avalanche forward, said he had settled his lawsuit against Bertuzzi and the Canucks, closing one of the most violent on-ice episodes in N.H.L. history.
snippet: Moore, a former Avalanche forward, said he had settled his lawsuit against Bertuzzi and the Canucks, closing one of the most violent on-ice episodes in N.H.L. history.
